title: Bugfixes and major backend improvement preparations

changes.change: Reduced the amount of users that you can see when route syncing to 1. To view more users, press the three dots to see a full list. This will help with the header being too crowded on popular routes.
Pull descriptions can now have up to 500 characters (up from 255).
Editing a route's name no longer replaces it with the new title incorrectly in the header.
Various elements in the pull sidebar now properly align vertically.
"Show across all teams" for map icons is now a checkbox as intended.
Editing an object twice in a row while in combined floor mode (MDT map style) no longer applies translations twice, leading to an incorrect placement of the object.
